channel.title: Pipelayer/Welding_pipelayer on Universal
channel.description: Recent content in Pipelayer/Welding_pipelayer on Universal

item.title: E02296
item.description: Caterpillar 345CL, Excavator pipelayer,10 units available, tipping point 88 ton, 9.2mtr. A-frame boom, cab with heater and airco. Braden planetary dual brake lifting and deriking winch, 2 speed Rexroth hydr. piston motors, 19mm rope diameter, hydr. boom stop, anti-two block system, hydraulic joystick control, 3 side working range, can be transported in one load. Machine is in as new condition. For sales and rental info please contact: Tel. +31653853392 or E-mail: John@deltamachinery.

item.title: E02311
item.description: Caterpillar 345CL, Excavator pipelayer,10 units available, tipping point 88 ton, 9.2mtr. A-frame boom, cab with heater and airco. Braden planetary dual brake lifting and deriking winch, 2 speed Rexroth hydr. piston motors, 19mm rope diameter, hydr. boom stop, anti-two block system, hydraulic joystick control, 3 side working range, can be transported in one load. Machine is in as new condition. For sales and rental info please contact: Tel. +31653853392 or E-mail: John@deltamachinery.

item.title: E03222
item.description: EPE PL95H, Hydrostatic pipelayers,10 units available, CE marked, 95 ton lifting capacity, Caterpillar C13 Tier IIIA engine 440HP, Linde hydrostatic transmission,10 km/h max speed, 9.0mtr. A frame boom, 2 Braden planetary dual brake winches, 2 speed Rexroth hydr. motors, 19mm rope, hydr. joystick control. For more info please contact John at Delta Pipeline Machinery: E-mail: John@deltamachinery.nl Phone: +31 888 966 966

item.title: E04269
item.description: Caterpillar D4E fitted with Midwestern hydraulic pipelayer kit, Caterpillar 3304 engine with 75HP (56kW), ROPS, hydraulic boom and hook winches, rubber boom protection, operating weight approx. 11.000 Kgs, wire ropes in good condition, undercarriage on average 75% remaining. Machine comes straight from job-site and is in very good and clean condition. Machine for sale or rent, subject to terms and conditions. Inspections are welcome.

item.title: E04467
item.description: Available for rent 20 units Caterpillar 594H S/N# 96V sideboom / pipelayers. All units are frame up rebuilds or fully repaired with servo controlled wet deck conversions, equipped with Braden - Paccar winches with 2 speed Bosch Rexroth hydr. motors, Kawasaki hydr. main pumps, Pat Kruger LML safe load system, Certified ROPS & FOPS fitted, all work orders and pictures of repairs & hydr. conversion available upon request. Tractor has D353 engine 410HP, 3 speed power-shift transmission and drawbar.

item.title: E04789
item.description: Caterpillar 330BL Excavator pipelayer, main machine sold new in 2002, converted into pipelayer in 2014, 3 units available, tipping point 65 ton, 7.3mtr. A-frame boom, Caterpillar 3306 engine, triple grouser pads, cab with heater and airconditioning. Braden planetary dual brake lifting and deriking winch, 2 speed Rexroth hydr. piston motors, 19mm rope diameter, hydr. boom stop, anti-two block system, hydraulic joystick control, 3 side working range, can be transported in one load incl.

item.title: E04830
item.description: Caterpillar 587R hydraulic operated pipelayers, delivered new in 2011, 8 units immediately available from stock The Netherlands, 91.625 kg lift capacity, 8.5 mtr boom (28ft) Paccar- Braden planetary winches, Free-fall function on hook line control, 2 speed Rexroth hydr. piston motors, 6 cylinder Caterpillar engine, Enclosed cab, 80% undercarriage, 864mm (34”) shoes, 3 speed powershift transmission, drawbar. Machines are in clean condition. For sale and/or rental information please contact: Tel. +31 653 85 3392 or E-mail: John@deltamachinery.
